suite.name: eBox traffic balance Test Suite
suite.desc: Contains a set of tests to ensure that ebox traffic balance capabilities work ok. (WAN failover included)

test.name: ConfigDHCP
test.desc: Configure eth2 as DHCP and set it as external.

test.name: ConfigDHCP2
test.desc: Configure eth3 as DHCP and set it as external.

test.name: EnableModules
test.desc: Enable network and firewall modules.

test.name: EnableBalance
test.desc: Enable traffic balance.

test.name: TestBalance
test.desc: Checks if the traffic is balanced between the two gateways.

test.name: EnableFailoverEvent
test.desc: Enable WAN failover watcher.

test.name: SetFailoverPeriod
test.desc: Set period to 10 seconds.

test.name: AddFailoverTestsA
test.desc: Add failover tests to router A.

test.name: AddFailoverTestsB
test.desc: Add failover tests to router B.

test.name: SaveChanges
test.desc: Save the changes.

test.name: Gateway-A-Down
test.desc: Simulate a fail in router-a.

test.name: CheckLog-A-Disconnected
test.desc: Checks event of A disconnected in the log.

test.name: TestBalanceWith-A-Down
test.desc: Checks if the traffic goes through router B.

test.name: Gateway-A-Up
test.desc: Simulate recovery in router-a.

test.name: CheckLog-A-Connected
test.desc: Checks event of A connected in the log.

test.name: TestBalanceAfter-A-Connected
test.desc: Checks if the traffic is balanced between the two gateways.

test.name: Gateway-B-Down
test.desc: Simulate a fail in router-b.

test.name: CheckLog-B-Disconnected
test.desc: Checks event of B disconnected in the log.

test.name: TestBalanceWith-B-Down
test.desc: Checks if the traffic goes through router A.

test.name: Gateway-B-Up
test.desc: Simulate recovery in router-b.

test.name: CheckLog-B-Connected
test.desc: Checks event of B connected in the log.

test.name: TestBalanceAfter-B-Connected
test.desc: Checks if the traffic is balanced between the two gateways.
